extends java.lang.Object

    Author:
    Rafi Rosenbaum, Orly Sharon, Liz Sror

      • setClustersByZoom

        public java.util.List<Cluster> setClustersByZoom(int zoom)
        The function setClustersByZoom build the map of this zoom according the previous map
        Parameters:
        zoom - the zoom number
        Returns:
        List which contains all the clusters on the specific zoom

      • isContain

        private boolean isContain(Cluster thisZoomCluster,
                          Cluster prevZoomCluster,
                          int zoom)
        The function isContain get two cluster and check if prevZoomCluster contain in thisZoomCluster
        Parameters:
        thisZoomCluster - cluster from the previous zoom
        prevZoomCluster - cluster from the present zoom
        zoom - the present zoom number
        Returns:
        true if prevZoomCluster contain in thisZoomCluster by the distance according the viewZoomAlg array

      • firstZoom

        private java.util.List<Cluster> firstZoom()
        The function firstZoom converter each marker, that received from the Json file, to cluster
        Returns:
        List which contains all the clusters on the first zoom

      • setClusterType

        public void setClusterType(int zoom)
        The function setClusterType find the maximum type of markers that are in a specific cluster, for all the clusters an the map for a specific zoom
        Parameters:
        zoom - the present zoom number
